content: चाक्रिक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (की|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [चक्रेण चरति ठक्] {@--1@} See चाक्र above. {@--2@} Relating to a company or circle. --कः {@--1@} A potter. {@--2@} An oil-maker; <ls>Y. 1. 165</ls> (= तैलिक according to <ls>Mit.</ls>; शाकटिक or cartman according to others). {@--3@} A proclaimer. {@--4@} A bard, chorister. {@--5@} A coachman, driver.
